message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to revolutionize your business operations and significantly increase efficiency. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional opportunity.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I believe in the value of our product. I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $14500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, and I am willing to consider it. My counteroffer for the product is $14300.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to make a counteroffer of $14200 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution. My counteroffer for the product is $14250.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to make a counteroffer of $14200 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to compromise. My counteroffer for the product is $14225.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $14200 for the product.
